title: Less-or-Equal is Reflexive
description:
Prove that every natural number is less than or equal to itself.

**Goal:** `forall n : nat, n <= n`

In Coq, `n <= m` is defined inductively as `le n m`. Reflexivity (`le_n`) gives you `n <= n` directly.
hints: The `apply le_n` tactic directly proves `n <= n` using the base constructor of `le`
Alternatively, `lia` or `auto` can solve this automatically
template:
Theorem le_reflexive : forall n : nat, n <= n.
Proof.
  (* Your proof here *)
Admitted.
solution:
Theorem le_reflexive : forall n : nat, n <= n.
Proof.
  intro n.
  apply le_n.
Qed.
